title: Obed Wild & Scenic River: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       Your safety while visiting the Obed Wild and Scenic River is very important. We want every visitor to enjoy a safe outing while at the Obed WSR. Please use common sense when hiking or climbing. Please bring enough clothing and water to adapt to changing weather conditions. In the event of an emergency, please call 911.
